section.title: Index terms
section.p: Index terms should not start with the product name, for example if the product name is oXygen or SyncroSoft, do not use

body.p: without mentioning the product name because that will not be relevant, as the product is already the context for the index term.

dlentry.dd: Do not use oXygen in index terms!

section.title: Author information
section.p: Record the author of each topic using the author element inside the topic prolog.

section.title: Titles and short descriptions
section.p: Titles should not be very long, we should keep them less than 10 words.

dlentry.dd: Titles should not be long, keep them less than 10 words.

section.p: Short descriptions should be less than 20 words and also less than 160 characters so we can use them easily with twitter.

dlentry.dd: Short deascription shopuld be used on twitter so we need to keep them less than 160 characters.
